name: House Atreides
startIntroPart1: A newly arrived House Major from the lush earth-like planet of Caladan, transferred to Arrakis on behalf of the Padishah Emperor.
startIntroPart2: A House that knows the ways of peace and the visions of paradise from their homeworld of Caladan, would they be able to save Arrakis from others.. or be clouded by their own unrecognizable visions?
introduction: Greetings from House Atreides, we will treat you fairly.
declaringWar: We will remember this, you traitors!
attacked: How dare you commit this act!
defeated: You have betrayed our House, may the will of House Atreides live on!
hateHello: What do you wish to discuss.
hateNo: I cannot understand your foolish demands.
afterPeace: You declare the words of peace, we respect your decision.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: House Harkonnen
startIntroPart1: A long-standing House Major from Giedi Prime, granted the siridar fief of Arrakis to extract its resources.
startIntroPart2: Set on the goals of maximum industrialisation and economic progress, would they be able to make Arrakis an economic powerhouse- or would they be known as a tyrannical single-minded House?
introduction: We House Harkonnen, are we are greatly pleased at your.. arrival.
declaringWar: You want to play these games? I'll make you suffer.
defeated: You have destroyed me on Arrakis, yet do not let it get into your head, I will come back to crush you.
hateLetsHearIt: You tread on House Harkonnen grounds once more- make it quick.
hateNo: You offer us such a disrespectful offer.
No! Don't ever offer that again.
afterPeace: Finally, you have shown us respect.
tradeRequest: I accept your unwieldy trade offer.
